item.title: Stellantis即将收购中国电动汽车制造商零跑汽车20%的股份 - 彭博社
item.description:
Stellantis NV (STLAM.MI) reaffirmed on Wednesday it was studying closer ties with Chinese carmakers after Bloomberg reported it was nearing a deal to acquire a roughly 20% stake in electric vehicle company Zhejiang Leapmotor (9863.HK).

彭博社报道称，Stellantis NV (STLAM.MI)即将达成收购电动汽车公司浙江零跑汽车(9863.HK)约 20% 股份的交易，该公司周三重申正在研究与中国汽车制造商建立更密切的关系。

Leapmotor and Stellantis are also discussing setting up a joint venture as part of the transaction, the Bloomberg report said, citing people with knowledge of the matter, adding that a partnership could allow Stellantis to manufacture and sell some Leapmotor cars outside China.

彭博社援引知情人士的话称，作为交易的一部分，零跑汽车和 Stellantis 还在讨论建立一家合资企业，并补充说，合作伙伴关系可能会让 Stellantis 在中国境外生产和销售一些零跑汽车。

The partnership would also give Stellantis access to the EV maker's parts and certain technologies, according to the report.

据报道，此次合作还将使 Stellantis 能够获得这家电动汽车制造商的零部件和某些技术。

Stellantis, whose brands include Fiat and Peugeot, has only a very small presence in China, the world's largest auto market. The group and rivals such as Renault (RENA.PA) are concerned about growing competition from cheap Chinese electric cars in Europe.

Stellantis旗下品牌包括菲亚特和标致，但在全球最大的汽车市场中国的业务规模很小。该集团和雷诺（RENA.PA）等竞争对手担心欧洲廉价中国电动汽车的竞争日益激烈。

In a statement, Stellantis said it had previously announced it was "studying scenarios to seize business opportunities linked to the dynamics of Chinese manufacturers in the context of the electrification of the global automobile market", without elaborating.

Stellantis在一份声明中表示，该公司此前曾宣布“正在研究情景，以在全球汽车市场电气化的背景下抓住与中国制造商动态相关的商机”，但没有详细说明。

Leapmotor, which has a market value of around 42 billion Hong Kong dollars ($5.4 billion), declined to comment. Its shares have gained some 22% this year.

零跑汽车的市值约为 420 亿港元（54 亿美元），拒绝置评。今年其股价上涨了约22%。

The companies are hammering out the final details of a transaction and an announcement could be made in the coming days, Bloomberg said.

彭博社称，两家公司正在敲定交易的最终细节，可能会在未来几天内发布公告。

Stellantis is due to publish its third-quarter revenue figures next Tuesday.

Stellantis 定于下周二公布第三季度营收数据。

The group said a year ago it was closing its joint venture that makes Jeeps in China with local partner Guangzhou Automobile Group (601238.SS) amid disappointing results.

该集团一年前表示，由于业绩令人失望，它将关闭与当地合作伙伴广州汽车集团（601238.SS）在中国生产吉普车的合资企业。

Leapmotor said last week its gross margin in the third quarter had turned positive, the first time for the startup even though the industry has been suffering a price war this year.

零跑汽车上周表示，尽管今年该行业遭遇了价格战，但其第三季度的毛利率已转为正数，这对于初创公司来说还是第一次。

It is a goal the company has been striving for this year, mainly to improve its valuation with a view to a further fundraising, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said. ($1 = 7.8215 Hong Kong dollars)

一位直接知情人士表示，这是该公司今年一直在努力实现的目标，主要是为了提高估值，以期进一步融资。 (1 美元 = 7.8215 港元)

Reporting by Akanksha Khushi in Bengaluru; Additional reporting by Gilles Guillaume in Paris, Giulio Piovaccari in Milan, Zhang Yan in Shanghai; Writing by Keith Weir; Editing by Shilpi Majumdar, Shweta Agarwal, Mike Harrison and Jan Harvey

item.title: 拜登欢迎澳大利亚阿尔巴尼亚人；中国与网络安全提上议程
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden welcomed Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese to the White House on Wednesday to discuss maritime and cybersecurity defense as they coordinate their China strategy while separately seeking to ease tensions with Beijing.

美国总统乔·拜登周三欢迎澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内斯来到白宫，讨论海上和网络安全防御问题，双方协调对华战略，同时寻求缓解与北京的紧张关系。

Australia is a key U.S. ally in the Pacific and the visit comes as crisis rages in the Middle East. Biden scheduled the visit after canceling a trip to Sydney in May to stay in Washington and negotiate a government funding crisis.

澳大利亚是美国在太平洋地区的重要盟友，此次访问正值中东危机肆虐之际。拜登在取消五月份前往悉尼的行程后安排了这次访问，以留在华盛顿并就政府资金危机进行谈判。

The U.S. Australia partnership is "an alliance that is marked by imagination, ingenuity and innovation," Biden told the prime minister upon his arrival at the U.S. presidential complex in Washington, citing their partnership on World War One, World War Two, and the war on terror.

拜登在抵达华盛顿美国总统府时对总理表示，美澳伙伴关系是“一个以想象力、独创性和创新为标志的联盟”，并列举了两国在第一次世界大战、第二次世界大战和战争中的伙伴关系关于恐怖。

The visit is expected to result in agreements aimed at deterring and competing with China, even as separately the two countries try to thaw relations with Beijing. The two nations are committed to making sure the "Indopacific remains free, open, prosperous and secure," Biden said.

预计这次访问将达成旨在威慑中国并与中国竞争的协议，尽管两国分别试图解冻与北京的关系。拜登表示，两国致力于确保“印度太平洋地区保持自由、开放、繁荣和安全”。

The expected deals include launching an undersea internet cable project and maritime wharf infrastructure investment designed to benefit and woo Pacific Island nations whose assistance may be needed to respond to any future conflict over Taiwan or the South China Sea, according to U.S. officials.

美国官员表示，预期的交易包括启动海底互联网电缆项目和海上码头基础设施投资，旨在造福和吸引太平洋岛国，这些国家可能需要援助来应对未来台湾或南中国海的任何冲突。

Washington and Canberra, already partners in a decades-old collective defense agreement, will also announce wider security cooperation with Japan.

华盛顿和堪培拉已经是数十年之久的集体防御协议的合作伙伴，它们也将宣布与日本进行更广泛的安全合作。

The balancing act of strengthening deterrence against China without offending Beijing too much is made more complicated by a Middle East crisis that has again diverted Washington's attention away from the Indo-Pacific.

中东危机再次将华盛顿的注意力从印太地区转移，这使得加强对华威慑而又不过分冒犯北京的平衡行动变得更加复杂。

A leadership vacuum in the U.S. House of Representatives has also complicated the approval of a set of laws needed to deliver on Biden's promise to support the AUKUS defense partnership between the United States, Britain and Australia. The AUKUS deal includes transferring sensitive U.S. and British nuclear submarine technology to Australia.

美国众议院的领导真空也使得兑现拜登支持美国、英国和澳大利亚之间 AUKUS 防务伙伴关系的承诺所需的一系列法律的批准变得复杂。 AUKUS 协议包括将敏感的美国和英国核潜艇技术转让给澳大利亚。

Financing and approvals related to AUKUS still need to come from Congress, where Republican lawmakers, who have a narrow majority, have repeatedly failed to line up enough support behind a party candidate to elect a new speaker of the House.

AUKUS 相关的融资和批准仍然需要来自国会，在国会中，占微弱多数的共和党议员 一再未能为党内候选人争取足够的支持来选举新的众议院议长。

On Friday, the Biden administration submitted a supplementary budget request to Congress that includes measures to support U.S. commitments under AUKUS.

周五，拜登政府向国会提交了一份补充预算请求，其中包括支持美国在 AUKUS 下的承诺的措施。

A senior administration official said Biden would reassure Albanese that the United States will follow through on its end of the deal as Australians express private frustrations over the delays in moving ahead on the partnership.

一名高级政府官员表示，拜登将向阿尔巴尼斯保证，美国将履行协议，因为澳大利亚人对拖延推进这一伙伴关系表示私下的沮丧。

"We're in close and deep consultations on Capitol Hill," the official told reporters. "We are confident that the various procedural steps and budget conditions necessary to move forward with pillar one of AUKUS will move through in a way that will support our larger endeavor."

这位官员告诉记者：“我们正在国会山进行密切而深入的磋商。” “我们相信，推进 AUKUS 支柱之一所需的各种程序步骤和预算条件将以支持我们更大努力的方式取得进展。”

BEIJING TENSIONS

The U.S.-Australian efforts, designed to counter China's territorial claims and reduce trade dependence on the Asian country, come as both countries also work to reduce diplomatic tensions with Beijing.

美国和澳大利亚的努力旨在对抗中国的领土主张并减少对这个亚洲国家的贸易依赖，同时两国也都在努力缓解与北京的外交紧张关系。

Albanese will visit China, Australia's largest trade partner and biggest buyer of its iron ore, on Nov. 4.

阿尔巴内斯将于11月4日访问中国，澳大利亚最大的贸易伙伴和铁矿石的最大买家。

White House aides are working to lock down a meeting between Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping during the Nov. 11-17 Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in San Francisco.

白宫助手正在努力锁定拜登和中国国家主席习近平在 11 月 11 日至 17 日在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织峰会期间举行的会面。

Biden and Albanese will also seek to boost cooperation on cybersecurity and Australia's rare earth minerals output to reduce reliance on China, the dominant supplier.

拜登和阿尔巴尼斯还将寻求加强网络安全和澳大利亚稀土矿产量方面的合作，以减少对主要供应商中国的依赖。

Biden will also announce that a cyberattack on Australia could be taken as an "armed" attack that would trigger U.S. collective defense obligations. In the event of such an attack, the United States would make a case-by-case decision on whether to invoke the treaty, according to another U.S. official.

拜登还将宣布，对澳大利亚的网络攻击可能被视为“武装”攻击，从而触发美国的集体防御义务。另一位美国官员表示，如果发生此类攻击，美国将根据具体情况决定是否援引该条约。

Australia has been a major hacking target for China.

澳大利亚一直是中国的主要黑客攻击目标。

Biden will also work on the more intangible parts of the U.S.-Australian alliance, hosting Albanese and his partner Jodie Haydon for an official state dinner.

拜登还将致力于美澳联盟的更无形的部分，接待阿尔巴尼斯和他的搭档朱迪·海顿参加官方国宴。

Attendees will eat a three-course banquet prepared by five-time James Beard Foundation Award nominee Katie Button, set against a canvas of American Monarch butterflies and Australian Cairns Birdwing butterflies.

与会者将享用由五次詹姆斯比尔德基金会奖提名者凯蒂·巴顿准备的三道菜宴会，宴会上有美国帝王蝶和澳大利亚凯恩斯鸟翼蝶。

Nodding to the downbeat politics of the moment, a planned performance by the pop group B-52s at the dinner is being scrapped in favor of music from a U.S. military band.

为了迎合当前悲观的政治形势，流行乐队 B-52s 在晚宴上的表演计划被取消，取而代之的是一支美国军乐队的音乐。

Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt; additional reporting by Susan Heavey; Editing by Tom Hogue and Heather Timmons

item.title: 下半场表现让山东队亚冠夺冠
item.description:
Shandong Taishan moved to the top of Group G of the Asian Champions League on Wednesday as Brazilian striker Cryzan and former Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini scored in the second half to secure a 2-0 win over hosts Incheon United.

周三，亚冠联赛G组山东泰山队凭借巴西前锋克雷赞和前曼联中场费莱尼在下半场的进球，以2-0战胜东道主仁川联队，以小组第一的身份晋级。

Cryzan came off the bench in the 55th minute and broke the deadlock three minutes later with a strike from distance that bent into the top corner before Fellaini scored from close range to confirm the three points for the Chinese Super League side.

第55分钟，克赖赞替补登场，三分钟后远射破门打破僵局，费莱尼近距离射门破门，中超球队确认三分。

The South Koreans led the standings ahead of the game but are now level on six points with Shandong, who move into pole position thanks to a better head-to-head record over Incheon and third-placed Yokohama F Marinos.

韩国队在比赛前领先积分榜，但现在与山东队同积 6 分，山东队凭借对仁川队和排名第三的横滨水手队的更好交锋记录，取得杆位。

The Japanese outfit also picked up their second win of the group phase when they handed visitors Kaya FC-Iloilo from the Philippines a 3-0 defeat with Kota Mizunuma, Kenyu Sugimoto and Anderson Lopes on target for Kevin Muscat's team.

日本球队还取得了小组赛的第二场胜利，他们以 3-0 击败了来自菲律宾的卡亚 FC-伊洛伊洛，水沼光太、杉本健宇和安德森·洛佩斯为凯文·马斯喀特的球队进球。

Only the winners of each of the 10 groups in the Asian Champions League are certain to progress to the last 16, where they will be joined by the three runners-up from the eastern and western halves of the continent with the best records.

只有亚冠联赛10个小组的冠军才有资格晋级16强，与东、西战绩最好的三支亚军一起晋级。

Thailand's Bangkok United maintained their perfect start in Group F by coming from behind to beat Kitchee 2-1 in Hong Kong.

泰国曼谷联队在香港赛场上以2-1逆转击败杰志队，保持了F组的完美开局。

Austria international Jakob Jantscher, a summer signing for the Hong Kong champions, gave Kitchee a seventh-minute lead but Rungrath Phumichantuk levelled four minutes into first half stoppage time.

香港冠军队夏季签约的奥地利国脚雅各布·詹切尔（Jakob Jantscher）在第七分钟为杰奇取得领先，但朗格拉特·普米恰图克（Rungrath Phumichantuk）在上半场补时四分钟后扳平了比分。

Willen Mota put Bangkok in front from the penalty spot seven minutes after the interval when Fernando handled inside the area and the Thais held on to all three points despite Bassel Jradi's 84th-minute sending off.

中场休息七分钟后，费尔南多在禁区内处理球，维伦·莫塔在点球点帮助曼谷取得领先，尽管巴塞尔·贾拉迪在第 84 分钟被罚下，泰国队还是保住了全部三分。

Bangkok lead twice champions Jeonbuk Motors by three points after Dan Petrescu's team eased to a 3-0 win over Lion City Sailors, with the Singaporeans in third and Kitchee rooted to the bottom without a point.

丹·彼得雷斯库 (Dan Petrescu) 率领的球队以 3-0 轻取狮城水手队 (Lion City Sailors)，曼谷队领先两届冠军全北汽车队 (Jeonbuk Motors) 3 分，新加坡队排名第三，杰志 (Kitchee) 则一分未得，垫底。

In Group H, first half goals from Alessandro Lopane and Jamie Maclaren saw Melbourne City secure a 2-0 win over Buriram United in Thailand to move onto seven points from three games.

H组中，凭借亚历山德罗·洛帕内和杰米·麦克拉伦上半场的进球，墨尔本城队在泰国2-0战胜武里南联队，三场比赛积7分。

The Australians lead the standings by three points from Japan's Ventforet Kofu, who slipped to their first loss when Lucas Possignolo and Nyasha Mushekwi earned the Chinese hosts a 2-0 win and their first points of the campaign.

澳大利亚队在积分榜上领先日本队文特福雷特甲府队 3 分，后者在卢卡斯·波西尼洛和尼亚沙·穆舍奎为中国东道主队以 2-0 获胜并取得本赛季首个积分后，滑向了他们的首场失利。

Reporting by Michael Church, Editing by Christian Radnedge

item.title: 赛默飞世尔预测软生物技术和中国需求导致年度利润疲弱
item.description:
Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO.N) forecast 2023 and 2024 profit below Wall Street estimates, hurt by persistently weak demand from biotech clients and slow economic growth in key market China.

由于生物技术客户需求持续疲软以及主要市场中国经济增长缓慢，赛默飞世尔科技(TMO.N)预测 2023 年和 2024 年利润低于华尔街预期。

The medical equipment maker's shares fell more than 8% on Wednesday, dragging down shares of rivals Agilent Technologies (A.N) and Danaher (DHR.N) between 4% and 5%.

这家医疗设备制造商的股价周三下跌超过 8%，拖累竞争对手安捷伦科技(AN)和丹纳赫(DHR.N)的股价下跌 4% 至 5%。

Core revenue growth and adjusted profit in 2024 will be similar to that in 2023, Thermo Fisher CFO Stephen Williamson said on a conference call, adding that conditions during the third quarter will continue for the rest of the year.

Thermo Fisher 首席财务官 Stephen Williamson 在电话会议上表示，2024 年的核心收入增长和调整后利润将与 2023 年类似，并补充说第三季度的情况将持续到今年剩余时间。

Thermo Fisher and rival Danaher (DHR.N) have both witnessed soft demand for their bioprocessing services used in making therapies and vaccines as biotechs become more cautious about their spending.

随着生物技术公司对其支出变得更加谨慎，赛默飞世尔和竞争对手丹纳赫(DHR.N)都见证了对其用于制造疗法和疫苗的生物加工服务的需求疲软。

Rising interest rates have squeezed funding needed for drug development programs, while slow economic growth in China has also weighed on demand for contract research services offered by Thermo Fisher and Danaher.

利率上升挤压了药物开发项目所需的资金，而中国经济增长缓慢也打压了赛默飞世尔和丹纳赫提供的合同研究服务的需求。

Thermo Fisher has been expanding its range of services through deals in recent years, in a bid to become a one-stop shop for its biotech and large pharmaceutical clients.

近年来，赛默飞一直通过交易扩大其服务范围，力求成为其生物技术和大型制药客户的一站式服务。

The company cut its revenue expectations for the year to $42.7 billion, from its previous outlook of $43.4 billion to $44 billion.

该公司将今年的收入预期从之前的 434 亿美元下调至 427 亿美元。

Thermo Fisher lowered its annual profit forecast for the second straight quarter. It now expects to earn $21.50 per share, excluding items, for 2023, down from its previous outlook of $22.28 to $22.72 per share.

赛默飞连续第二个季度下调了年度利润预期。目前，该公司预计 2023 年每股收益为 21.50 美元（不计项目），低于之前每股 22.28 美元至 22.72 美元的预期。

Analysts were expecting full-year profit of $22.28 per share and revenue of $43.49 billion, according to LSEG data.

根据 LSEG 的数据，分析师预计全年每股利润为 22.28 美元，营收为 434.9 亿美元。

The company also forecast 2024 adjusted profit of $21.75 per share, below analysts' estimates of $23.98.

该公司还预测 2024 年调整后每股利润为 21.75 美元，低于分析师预期的 23.98 美元。

Thermo Fisher reported third-quarter revenue of $10.57 billion, missing Wall Street expectations of $10.60 billion.

Thermo Fisher公布第三季度营收为105.7亿美元，低于华尔街预期的106亿美元。

On an adjusted basis, the company earned $5.69 per share, beating estimates of $5.61.

调整后，该公司每股收益 5.69 美元，超出预期的 5.61 美元。

Reporting by Bhanvi Satija in Bengaluru; Editing by Shinjini Ganguli and Shounak Dasgupta

item.title: 中国与美国亲密盟友哥伦比亚升级外交关系
item.description:
Summary:
  • China, Colombia elevate ties to strategic partnership

    中国与哥伦比亚将关系提升为战略伙伴关系
  • Colombia is one of closest U.S. allies in Latin America

    哥伦比亚是美国在拉丁美洲最亲密的盟友之一
  • Colombia yet to join Xi's Belt and Road Initiative

    哥伦比亚尚未加入习近平的“一带一路”倡议

China elevated diplomatic relations with Colombia to a strategic partnership on Wednesday, deepening a push with one of the oldest U.S. allies to expand its influence and strengthen its foothold in Latin America.

中国周三将与哥伦比亚的外交关系提升为战略伙伴关系，深化与美国最古老的盟友之一的合作，以扩大其影响力并加强其在拉丁美洲的立足点。

The two countries upgraded their relations, first established in 1980, as Colombian President Gustavo Petro met his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping on a visit to Beijing this week, his first to the world's second-largest economy since assuming office last year.

两国升级了自 1980 年首次建立的关系，哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃·佩特罗 (Gustavo Petro) 本周访问北京时会见了中国国家主席习近平，这是他自去年上任以来首次访问世界第二大经济体。

The upgrade of relations with Colombia means China now has strategic ties with 10 out of the 11 South American countries with which it has relations. Guyana is the only country in the region with which it has ordinary bilateral ties.

与哥伦比亚关系升级意味着中国与11个南美国家中的10个建立了战略关系。圭亚那是该地区唯一与其建立正常双边关系的国家。

China in recent years has stepped up a charm offensive in South America, Central America and the Caribbean, a region of strategic significance for arch-rival the United States.

近年来，中国加大了对南美、中美洲和加勒比地区的魅力攻势，这些地区对美国的主要竞争对手具有战略意义。

The region is also significant to China as it hosts a handful of countries that have no ties with Beijing but instead recognise democratically governed Taiwan as a sovereign state. Paraguay is the last South American nation that has ties with Taiwan, which China claims as part of its territory.

该地区对中国也很重要，因为它拥有少数与北京没有关系但承认民主治理的台湾为主权国家的国家。巴拉圭是最后一个与台湾有关系的南美国家，中国声称台湾是其领土的一部分。

During the COVID pandemic, China was the first country that sent vaccines to Colombia. In 2021, in recognition of China's help in fighting the coronavirus, Xi was invited to give a speech via video link to the people of Colombia.

新冠疫情期间，中国是第一个向哥伦比亚运送疫苗的国家。 2021年，为表彰中国为抗击新冠病毒所提供的帮助，习近平应邀向哥伦比亚人民发表视频讲话。

Chinese imports from Colombia have risen sharply in the last few years, becoming the South American nation's second-biggest trading partner after the United States. In 2022, shipments from Colombia to China totalled $7 billion, up almost 20% from five years earlier.

过去几年，中国从哥伦比亚的进口大幅增长，成为该南美国家仅次于美国的第二大贸易伙伴。 2022年，哥伦比亚向中国出口总额达70亿美元，比五年前增长近20%。

The two countries signed 12 cooperation deals during the visit, Petro's office said in a statement, including one allowing Colombian beef imports from next year and another allowing shipments of quinoa, as well as the establishment of several working groups meant to improve commerce.

石油公司办公室在一份声明中表示，两国在访问期间签署了 12 项合作协议，其中一项允许从明年开始进口哥伦比亚牛肉，另一项允许装运藜麦，此外还成立了多个旨在改善商业的工作组。

Colombia is one of the closest U.S. allies in the region. A middle-income nation and one of the oldest democracies in Latin America, it established ties with the United States in 1822.

哥伦比亚是美国在该地区最亲密的盟友之一。作为一个中等收入国家，也是拉丁美洲最古老的民主国家之一，它于 1822 年与美国建立了联系。

Colombia has yet to join Xi's multi-region infrastructure Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), unlike many of its Latin American and Caribbean neighbours.

与许多拉丁美洲和加勒比邻国不同，哥伦比亚尚未加入习近平的多区域基础设施“一带一路”倡议。

Former Colombia President Ivan Duque, who welcomed warmer ties with China and visited Beijing in 2019, had previously expressed a willingness to join the BRI.

哥伦比亚前总统伊万·杜克欢迎与中国的关系升温，并于2019年访问北京，此前曾表示愿意加入“一带一路”。

'GREAT IMBALANCE'

On his arrival in Beijing on Tuesday, Petro hailed the potential to increase Colombian exports to China and re-launch the Andean country's national rail network.

周二抵达北京时，佩特罗对增加哥伦比亚对中国出口和重新启动这个安第斯国家的国家铁路网络的潜力表示欢迎。

China Harbour Engineering Company (CHEC) is expected to complete by 2026 two subway lines of the Bogota Metro, a $4 billion project 30% funded by Chinese banks awarded to the CHEC, Xian Metro Company and Canada's Bombardier Inc consortium in 2019.

中国港湾工程公司 (CHEC) 预计将在 2026 年之前完成波哥大地铁的两条地铁线路，该项目耗资 40 亿美元，其中 30% 由中资银行出资，并于 2019 年授予中国港湾工程公司、西安地铁公司和加拿大庞巴迪公司财团。

Colombia also awarded its RegioTram light rail system project to China Civil Engineering Construction Corporation (CCECC) in 2019.

哥伦比亚还于2019年将其RegioTram轻轨系统项目授予中国土木工程建设集团公司（CCECC）。

Chinese state-run mining firm Zijin Mining acquired a gold mine in Colombia in 2019 but the project has faced repeated security issues and road blockades.

中国国营矿业公司紫金矿业于2019年收购了哥伦比亚的一座金矿，但该项目多次面临安全问题和道路封锁。

Despite loans, investments and offers to build infrastructure, China was asked to import more from South America.

尽管有贷款、投资和建设基础设施的提议，中国仍被要求从南美洲进口更多产品。

"When we look at the trade balance between Colombia and China, we find a great imbalance, a great inequality, a product of the economic history of the two countries," Petro told Xi on Wednesday. "There is a huge deficit."

“当我们审视哥伦比亚和中国之间的贸易平衡时，我们发现严重的不平衡、严重的不平等，这是两国经济历史的产物，”佩特罗周三对习近平表示。 “存在巨大的赤字。”

Among the 11 South American countries that have diplomatic ties with Beijing, Colombia has the largest trade deficit with China despite increased Chinese imports. Colombia had a trade deficit of more than $8 billion last year.

在与北京建交的11个南美国家中，尽管中国进口增加，但哥伦比亚对中国的贸易逆差最大。哥伦比亚去年的贸易逆差超过80亿美元。

Argentina, Venezuela, Bolivia and Suriname also posted trade deficits with China in 2022.

阿根廷、委内瑞拉、玻利维亚和苏里南2022年也对中国出现贸易逆差。

item.title: 保时捷警告奢侈品牌无法幸免于经济困境，股价跌至一年低点
item.description:
Summary:
  • Interest rates hitting demand globally - CFO

    首席财务官：利率冲击全球需求
  • Sales, 9 month returns in line with annual forecast

    销售额、9 个月回报率符合年度预测
  • Stronger North America, Europe sales compensate China dip

    北美和欧洲销售的强劲弥补了中国市场的下滑

Porsche AG (P911_p.DE) shares on Wednesday hit a one-year low since its listing last September as the carmaker warned the luxury sector was also feeling the hit of dampened consumer spending as interest rates rise.

保时捷股份公司(P911_p.DE)周三股价触及去年 9 月上市以来的一年新低，该汽车制造商警告称，随着利率上升，奢侈品行业也感受到了消费者支出减少的打击。

The company's supply chain was improving with inventories down, but high inflation combined with peak investments for a line of new products to launch in 2024 meant its costs were still high, Chief Financial Officer Lutz Meschke said.

首席财务官 Lutz Meschke 表示，随着库存下降，该公司的供应链正在改善，但高通胀加上 2024 年推出的一系列新产品的投资高峰意味着其成本仍然很高。

"Governments increased interest rates heavily... that creates a situation where customers are quite reluctant (to invest in) a new product," Meschke said.

“政府大幅提高利率......这造成了客户非常不愿意（投资）新产品的情况，”梅施克说。

Porsche shares inched down 1.13% from yesterday's close to a new low of 85.92 euros at 1227 GMT, in line with a slow downward spiral since May and a broader share price decline this year across luxury and cars.

格林威治标准时间 1227 点，保时捷股价较昨天收盘价小幅下跌 1.13%，触及 85.92 欧元的新低，与 5 月份以来的缓慢螺旋式下跌以及今年豪华汽车和汽车行业的股价普遍下跌一致。

From a confident start after its public listing last September, the company has struck more a cautious tone in recent quarterly calls, said Daniel Schwarz, an analyst at Stifel, managing investor expectations for its third-quarter results.

Stifel 管理投资者对其第三季度业绩预期的分析师丹尼尔·施瓦茨 (Daniel Schwarz) 表示， 去年 9 月公开上市后，该公司一开始信心十足，但在最近的季度电话会议中却表现得更加谨慎。

Tesla CEO Elon Musk also said last week he was worried that higher borrowing costs would prevent potential customers from affording its vehicles despite substantial price cuts, and other major carmakers have similarly become more cautious.

特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克上周还表示，尽管大幅降价，但他担心较高的借贷成本将阻止潜在客户购买其汽车，而其他主要汽车制造商也同样变得更加谨慎。

Rising inflation and economic uncertainty have curbed shoppers' appetite for luxury after years of blockbuster demand, hurting quarterly sales of major brands like LVMH and Gucci-owner Kering.

在多年的需求旺盛之后，不断上升的通胀和经济不确定性抑制了消费者对奢侈品的兴趣，损害了路威酩轩集团(LVMH)和古驰(Gucci)母公司开云集团(Kering)等主要品牌的季度销售额。

"We are suffering in the entire economy," said Meschke. "It is also hitting the luxury industry - you can follow it when it comes to share price development of all luxury retailers worldwide."

“我们整个经济都在遭受苦难，”梅施克说。 “它也冲击了奢侈品行业——当谈到全球所有奢侈品零售商的股价发展时，你可以跟随它。”

Porsche, which will launch new Panamera, Taycan and e-Macan models and a new sports car generation in the coming year, has spent 2 billion euros ($2.12 billion) so far in 2023 on research and development, the highest in a nine-month period in the company's history.

保时捷将于 2023 年推出新款 Panamera、Taycan 和 e-Macan 车型以及新一代跑车，截至 2023 年，其研发支出已达 20 亿欧元（合 21.2 亿美元），创 9 个月来最高水平公司历史上的一段时期。

Like other carmakers, it also faced a difficult market in China, with deliveries down 12% this year so far.

与其他汽车制造商一样，该公司在中国也面临着困难的市场，今年迄今为止的交付量下降了 12%。

Executives were in the country last week to discuss strategy with dealers, Meschke said, including opening up new community centres for customers in a bid to establish a stronger brand in electric cars.

梅施克表示，高管们上周在该国与经销商讨论战略，包括为客户开设新的社区中心，以建立更强大的电动汽车品牌。

The luxury carmaker reported an 18.3% return on sales with operating profit up 9% to 5.5 billion euros in the first nine months of the year, even as it faced added costs of preparing for four upcoming product launches next year.

这家豪华汽车制造商报告称，今年前 9 个月的销售回报率为 18.3%，营业利润增长 9%，达到 55 亿欧元，尽管该公司面临着准备明年即将推出的四款产品的额外成本。

Its 2023 forecast calls for a 17%-19% return on sales of 40 billion euros to 42 billion euros, betting on the resilience of luxury demand even amid high inflation and an uncertain global economy.

其预测 2023 年销售额回报率为 17%-19%，达到 400 亿欧元至 420 亿欧元，押注奢侈品需求的弹性，即使在高通胀和全球经济不确定的情况下也是如此。

Deliveries of its all-electric Taycan sports car grew 11% to 27,885 units, signalling a recovery from supply chain challenges in securing some parts for battery-electric vehicles that had clouded deliveries in the first half.

其全电动 Taycan 跑车的交付量增长了 11%，达到 27,885 辆，这表明该公司已从供应链挑战中恢复过来，这些挑战为确保上半年的交付量蒙上了阴影。

($1 = 0.9447 euros)

（1 美元 = 0.9447 欧元）

item.title: 加州州长纽瑟姆会见中国国家主席习近平
item.description:
California governor Gavin Newsom met Chinese president Xi Jinping on Wednesday to discuss climate change, raising hopes that China and the United States can find common ground ahead of an APEC summit and COP28 climate meeting next month.

加州州长加文·纽瑟姆周三会见了中国国家主席习近平，讨论了气候变化问题，这让人们希望中美能够在下个月的亚太经合组织峰会和第二十八次缔约方会议气候会议之前找到共同点。

Xi and U.S President Joe Biden are expected to meet at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in San Francisco in November, although the meeting has not been confirmed.

习近平和美国总统乔·拜登预计将于 11 月在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 峰会上会面，但会议尚未得到证实。

Newsom told reporters after the meeting that he had an opportunity to focus more deeply and substantively on the issue of climate with Xi, while they also discussed Israel and the deadly drug fentanyl.

纽瑟姆在会后告诉记者，他有机会与习近平更深入、更实质性地关注气候问题，同时他们还讨论了以色列和致命药物芬太尼。

"We're not going to move the needle on climate change unless the United States and China collaborate together," he said.

“除非美国和中国共同合作，否则我们不会在气候变化问题上取得进展，”他说。

There were "strategic red lines" in the relationship between the world's top two greenhouse gas emitters, but both sides were capable of managing them, he added.

他补充说，世界最大的两个温室气体排放国之间的关系存在“战略红线”，但双方都有能力管理它们。

During their meeting, Xi told Newsom that there was "huge potential" for the two countries to cooperate on green development and addressing climate change, state broadcaster CCTV said.

据中央电视台报道，习近平在会见期间告诉纽瑟姆，两国在绿色发展和应对气候变化方面的合作“潜力巨大”。

Xi said climate change could still become a "new bright spot" in the relationship between the two sides.

习近平表示，气候变化仍可能成为双方关系的“新亮点”。

Climate cooperation between the two countries has been disrupted in recent years, with Chinese officials insisting that climate issues could not be treated in isolation from the broader diplomatic and trade disputes between the two sides.

近年来，两国之间的气候合作受到干扰，中国官员坚称气候问题不能脱离两国之间更广泛的外交和贸易争端来处理。

U.S. climate envoy John Kerry visited Beijing in July to resume formal discussions with his Chinese counterpart Xie Zhenhua following a year-long hiatus caused by former House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan, a self-governing island that China claims.

美国气候特使约翰·克里 (John Kerry) 于 7 月访问北京，恢复与中国同行解振华的正式讨论，此前众议院议长南希·佩洛西 (Nancy Pelosi) 访问台湾（中国声称拥有主权），导致这一讨论中断了一年。

Kerry's three-day visit also included talks with Foreign Minister Wang Yi and Vice-President Han Zheng, but he did not meet Xi.

克里为期三天的访问还包括与外交部长王毅和国家副主席韩正举行会谈，但他没有会见习近平。

Newsom began his week-long trip to China on Monday, visiting Hong Kong and Shenzhen before meeting senior officials in Beijing on Wednesday, including Han and Wang.

纽瑟姆周一开始了为期一周的中国之行，访问了香港和深圳，然后于周三在北京会见了包括韩和王在内的高级官员。

He also signed a memorandum of understanding with China's planning agency, the National Development and Reform Commission, on climate cooperation.

他还与中国规划机构国家发展和改革委员会签署了气候合作谅解备忘录。

item.title: 电梯制造商通力第三季度订单超出预期，因中国市场强劲
item.description:
Finnish elevator and escalator maker Kone (KNEBV.HE) reported on Wednesday better-than-expected new orders for the third quarter, boosted by strong momentum from its key Chinese market.

芬兰电梯和自动扶梯制造商通力(KNEBV.HE)周三报告称，受其主要中国市场强劲势头的推动，第三季度新订单好于预期。

Kone's orders received fell by 7.7% to 1.99 billion euros ($2.10 billion) in the quarter, but that slightly beat analysts' estimate of 1.98 billion euros in a company-provided poll. At comparable exchange rates, the orders were up 0.3%.

通力本季度收到的订单下降了 7.7%，至 19.9 亿欧元（21 亿美元），但这略高于分析师在公司提供的调查中预期的 19.8 亿欧元。按可比汇率计算，订单增长了 0.3%。

The company's shares were up 3.9% at 1023 GMT after it posted the quarterly data.

截至格林威治标准时间 1023 点，该公司公布季度数据后，其股价上涨 3.9%。

"Orders received were stable, which I consider a good achievement given the soft overall New Business Solutions market," CEO Henrik Ehrnrooth said in an earnings statement.

首席执行官 Henrik Ehrnrooth 在一份收益声明中表示：“收到的订单很稳定，考虑到整体新业务解决方案市场疲软，我认为这是一个很好的成就。”

JPMorgan said in a briefing note that the strong order momentum was "supportive" in an earnings report that was on the whole "weaker-than-expected".

摩根大通在一份简报中表示，强劲的订单势头对整体“弱于预期”的财报起到了“支撑”。

Kone, which makes about a third of its sales in China, had earlier said it expected the new equipment market in the country to decline between 10% and 15% this year.

通力约三分之一的销售额来自中国，该公司早些时候曾表示，预计今年中国的新设备市场将下降 10% 至 15%。

Due to its bigger exposure to China, the Helsinki-listed company would be more vulnerable to that than its Swiss rival Schindler (SCHP.S). The Chinese market makes up about 15% of Schindler's sales.

由于在中国的业务规模更大，这家在赫尔辛基上市的公司比其瑞士竞争对手迅达(SCHP.S)更容易受到影响。中国市场约占迅达销售额的15%。

Schindler last week raised 2023 guidance after a 23% jump in quarterly profit, driven by growth in maintenance and other services.

在维护和其他服务增长的推动下，季度利润增长 23%，迅达上周上调了2023 年业绩指引。

Kone reiterated its business outlook, still expecting its sales growth at comparable exchange rates for the year 2023 to be in the range of 3.0%–6.0% and EBIT margin (earnings before interest and taxes) to be in the range of 11.0%–12.0%.

通力重申了其业务前景，仍预计 2023 年按可比汇率计算的销售额增长将在 3.0%–6.0% 范围内，息税前利润率（息税前利润）将在 11.0%–12.0 范围内%。

Earlier on Wednesday, Kone also appointed Philippe Delorme as its new CEO, saying he would take over from Ehrnrooth from Jan. 1. JPMorgan said it was an "excellent appointment for Kone".

周三早些时候，通力还任命 Philippe Delorme 为其新任首席执行官，并表示他将从 1 月 1 日起接替埃恩鲁特。摩根大通表示，这是“对通力来说非常出色的任命”。

Kone on Tuesday said it had completed selling its Russian operations to a Russian holding company S8 Capital.

通力周二表示，已完成将其俄罗斯业务出售给俄罗斯控股公司 S8 Capital。

The company said in March 2022 that it would cease deliveries and not sign new orders, announcing plans to divest its business and operations in Russia three months later.

该公司于 2022 年 3 月表示，将停止交付且不再签署新订单，三个月后宣布计划剥离其在俄罗斯的业务和业务。

Its adjusted EBIT rose by 3.3% to 315.9 million euros in the quarter, missing analysts' estimate of 329 million euros.

该季度调整后息税前利润增长 3.3%，达到 3.159 亿欧元，低于分析师预期的 3.29 亿欧元。

Reporting by Elviira Luoma in Gdansk Editing by Milla Nissi and Helen Popper

item.title: 中国国家主席习近平将会见加州州长加文·纽瑟姆
item.description:
China President Xi Jinping will meet California Governor Gavin Newsom, Chinese state media said on Wednesday.

中国官方媒体周三称，中国国家主席习近平将会见加州州长加文·纽瑟姆。

Newsom is also expected to meet several other high-ranking officials to discuss climate cooperation, promote bilateral economic development and tourism and encourage cultural exchanges.

纽瑟姆预计还会见其他几位高级官员，讨论气候合作、促进双边经济发展和旅游业以及鼓励文化交流。

item.title: 姚明表示，尽管经历了过去的动荡，NBA在中国仍是“一流”
item.description:
The National Basketball Association (NBA) and China may have encountered turbulence in their relations over the years but retired great Yao Ming told Reuters the league is still "first class" in his home country.

多年来，美国国家篮球协会（NBA）和中国的关系可能遇到了动荡，但退役球星姚明告诉路透社，NBA在他的祖国仍然是“一流的”。

Yao, the president of the Chinese Basketball Association, soared to stardom in the United States as the eight-time All-Star for the Houston Rockets, an affable, 7-foot, 6-inch NBA big man who dominated the league before retiring in 2011.

中国篮球协会主席姚明作为休斯敦火箭队的八次全明星球员而在美国一举成名，他是一位和蔼可亲、身高 7 英尺 6 英寸的 NBA 大个子，在 2007 年退役前统治了联盟。 2011年。

Yao propelled the league's popularity in his home country but relations between China and the NBA have not always been smooth.

姚明推动了NBA在祖国的受欢迎程度，但中国与NBA的关系并不总是一帆风顺。

Chinese broadcasters stopped airing Rockets games in 2019 after general manager Daryl Morey posted a message in support of anti-government protests in Hong Kong and, earlier this year, former NBA player Dwight Howard appeared in a promotional video in which he referred to Taiwan as a country, prompting backlash.

在总经理达里尔·莫雷发布支持香港反政府抗议活动的消息后，中国广播公司于 2019 年停止转播火箭队的比赛； 今年早些时候，前 NBA 球员德怀特·霍华德出现在一段宣传视频中，他在视频中将台湾称为“台湾”。国，引发强烈反弹。

"I have to say, the NBA is in the first class... (because) you know the players being exposed in China for so long," Yao said, when asked about the past issues between China and the NBA.

当被问及中国与NBA之间过去的问题时，姚明说：“我不得不说，NBA是一流的......（因为）你知道球员在中国被曝光这么久。”

"The players, the teams (are) all still very well welcome in China and (we had) a couple of players with (in) China just this past summer."

“球员、球队在中国仍然很受欢迎，就在去年夏天，我们有几名球员在中国。”

Minnesota Timberwolves small forward Kyle Anderson competed with China at the FIBA World Cup, while the Miami Heat's six-times All-Star Jimmy Butler embarked on a tour of the country over the summer.

明尼苏达森林狼队的小前锋凯尔·安德森随中国队参加了国际篮联世界杯，而迈阿密热火队的六届全明星球员吉米·巴特勒则在今年夏天开始了中国之旅。

Yao travelled to New York this week for the first time in nearly four years as part of a roughly 30-person Chinese delegation, and met with NBA Commissioner Adam Silver at a time when international participation in the league is at an all-time high.

本周，姚明作为大约 30 人的中国代表团的一员，近四年来首次前往纽约，并在国际球员对联盟的参与度达到历史最高水平之际会见了 NBA 总裁亚当·萧华。

"Everything looks (like it is) running very, very well (under) his management," he said of Silver, who took the reins in 2014.

“在他的管理下，一切看起来（就像是）运行得非常非常好，”他在谈到 2014 年上任的西尔弗时说道。

The trip coincides with the thawing of relations between China and another major sports body, the Women's Tennis Association (WTA), which concluded its China Open earlier this month after previously suspending competitions there over the disappearance of Peng Shuai.

此行恰逢中国与另一个主要体育机构——女子网球协会（WTA）之间的关系解冻。WTA 因彭帅失踪而暂停了中国公开赛，并于本月早些时候结束了中国公开赛。

Yao, a longtime friend of the former doubles number one, said he had met with Peng over dinner about two months ago and that she was doing well.

姚明是这位前双打第一的老朋友，他说他大约两个月前在晚餐时见过彭丽媛，她表现得很好。

Reporting by Amy Tennery in New York, additional reporting by Echo Wang in New York Editing by Christian Radnedge

item.title: 姚明表示，Wembanyama 是一位无与伦比的人才
item.description:
France's Victor Wembanyama possesses a talent that defies comparison, retired great Yao Ming told Reuters, as the seven-foot four-inch (2.24-metre) rookie makes his highly anticipated National Basketball Association (NBA) regular-season debut on Wednesday.

退役球星姚明告诉路透社，法国球员维克多·文巴尼亚马拥有无与伦比的天赋，这位身高七英尺四英寸（2.24米）的新秀将于周三迎来他备受期待的美国国家篮球协会（NBA）常规赛首秀。

Not since LeBron James 20 years ago has a prospect generated excitement on the level seen for the San Antonio Spurs' first overall pick, who will start at home against Texan rivals Dallas Mavericks after a remarkable preseason.

自 20 年前的勒布朗·詹姆斯以来，还没有一位新秀能像圣安东尼奥马刺队的状元秀那样令人兴奋，在经历了出色的季前赛后，马刺队将在主场对阵德克萨斯对手达拉斯小牛队。

"I never see a big guy like, you know, (who) can do such a thing like he does," said Yao, an eight-times NBA All-Star who stands two inches (five cms) taller than Wembanyama.

“我从来没有见过像他这样的大个子，你知道，他能做到这样的事情，”八次入选 NBA 全明星的姚明说，他的身高比温班亚马高两英寸（五厘米）。

"In a scout report where we say 'This guy is -- how old he is, you know, his height, his wingspan and his capabilities'... and 'He looks like, let's say, a former somebody', you know. For him it's like, I don't know who shall I put up... no comparing."

“在一份球探报告中，我们说‘这个人多大了，你知道，他的身高、他的臂展和他的能力’……还有‘他看起来像，比如说，一个前任’，你知道的。” .对他来说，这就像，我不知道我该忍受谁......没有比较。”

Yao spent his entire NBA career with the Houston Rockets and remains an iconic figure of Chinese sport after fuelling the popularity of the NBA in his home country. He retired from the NBA in 2011.

姚明的整个 NBA 职业生涯都在休斯敦火箭队度过，在推动 NBA 在祖国的受欢迎程度后，他仍然是中国体育界的标志性人物。他于2011年从NBA退役。

The Hall of Famer was reluctant to offer advice to Frenchman Wembanyama, who enters the NBA at a time of unprecedented international participation in the league.

这位名人堂成员不愿意向法国人温班亚马提供建议，后者在联盟中国际参与度空前的时期进入 NBA。

"He has his own expedition to go (on)," said Yao, who was travelling to New York as part of a some 30-person Chinese delegation this week.

“他有自己的探险任务要继续，”本周作为约 30 人的中国代表团成员前往纽约的姚明说。

"And my experience probably from 20 years ago, I'm not sure is still fit for today. So I just wish him all good luck."

“我的经历可能是20年前的，我不确定今天是否仍然适用。所以我祝他一切顺利。”

Reporting by Amy Tennery in New York, additional reporting by Echo Wang in New York; Editing by Clare Fallon

item.title: 克里姆林宫表示，俄罗斯并不关心中国增加核武库能力
item.description:
The Kremlin said on Wednesday it was not concerned by China increasing the capabilities of its nuclear arsenal, stressing Moscow's "advanced strategic partnership" with Beijing and China's sovereign right to ensure its own security.

克里姆林宫周三表示，并不担心中国增强核武库能力，并强调莫斯科与北京的“高级战略伙伴关系”以及中国确保自身安全的主权。

China has launched its first nuclear-powered guided missile submarines, according to the Pentagon's latest report on China's military, giving it land and sea attack options that were once the sole province of U.S. and Russian vessels.

根据五角大楼关于中国军事的最新报告，中国已经下水了第一艘核动力导弹潜艇，使其拥有了陆地和海上攻击能力，而这曾经是美国和俄罗斯船只的唯一选择。

"This does not cause us concern, our relations are an advanced strategic partnership, we have the most advanced stage of political dialogue, economic interaction," Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told reporters.

克里姆林宫发言人德米特里·佩斯科夫对记者表示：“这并没有引起我们的担忧，我们的关系是高级战略伙伴关系，我们拥有最先进的政治对话、经济互动阶段。”

"And in this case, China, which faces very serious challenges for its own security in the region, is taking steps that it considers appropriate.

“在这种情况下，中国在该地区的自身安全面临非常严峻的挑战，正在采取它认为适当的措施。

"This is the absolute sovereign right of this country."

“这是这个国家的绝对主权。”

Russia has forged even closer commercial, political and security ties with China, part of what they call a "no limits" partnership, since Moscow's decision to send tens of thousands of troops into Ukraine in February 2022, triggering sweeping Western sanctions.

自2022年2月莫斯科决定向乌克兰派遣数万名军队并引发西方全面制裁以来，俄罗斯与中国建立了更加密切的商业、政治和安全关系，这是他们所谓的“无限制”伙伴关系的一部分。

The Pentagon report, published on Oct. 20, marks the first apparent confirmation that modified submarines seen in Chinese shipyards over the last 18 months are Type 093B guided missile submarines.

五角大楼于 10 月 20 日发布的报告首次明显证实过去 18 个月在中国造船厂看到的改装潜艇是 093B 型导弹潜艇。

Russia has been tweaking its own legislation on nuclear matters this month, with parliament on Wednesday completing the passage of a law that withdraws Moscow's ratification of the global treaty banning nuclear weapons tests.

俄罗斯本月一直在调整自己的核问题立法，议会周三完成了一项法律的通过，该法律撤回了莫斯科对禁止核武器试验全球条约的批准。

Russia says it will not resume nuclear testing unless Washington does, but arms control experts are concerned it may be inching towards a test that the West would perceive as a threatening escalation in the context of the Ukraine war.

俄罗斯表示，除非华盛顿恢复核试验，否则它不会恢复核试验，但军控专家担心，俄罗斯可能正在缓慢进行核试验，而西方会认为这是乌克兰战争背景下的威胁性升级。

Reporting by Reuters; Writing by Alexander Marrow Editing by Gareth Jones

item.title: M&G Investments 任命 Amy Cho 为亚太区主管
item.description:
M&G Investments said on Wednesday it has appointed Amy Cho as Asia Pacific head and chief executive officer (CEO) of M&G Investments Singapore, subject to regulatory approval.

M&G Investments 周三表示，已任命 Amy Cho 为 M&G Investments Singapore 亚太区负责人兼首席执行官 (CEO)，尚待监管部门批准。

Cho, who was most recently at Schroders where she was CEO of Hong Kong and deputy head of Asia Pacific, will join the investment manager on Nov. 1. She will succeed Loretta Ng, who has decided to leave M&G in pursuit of personal aspirations.

Cho 最近在 Schroders 担任香港首席执行官兼亚太区副总裁，她将于 11 月 1 日加入投资经理。她将接替 Loretta Ng，Loretta Ng 决定离开 M&G 以追求个人抱负。

Cho will be responsible for accelerating M&G's distribution ambitions in Asia Pacific enabling the firm to better serve existing and prospective clients, M&G said in a statement.

M&G 在一份声明中表示，Cho 将负责加速 M&G 在亚太地区的分销雄心，使公司能够更好地服务现有和潜在客户。

M&G is part of UK-based M&G plc (MNG.L), a savings and investment business which was formed in 2017 via the merger of Prudential's UK and Europe savings and insurance operation and M&G.

M&G 是总部位于英国的 M&G plc (MNG.L)的一部分，M&G plc (MNG.L) 是一家储蓄和投资公司，于 2017 年通过保德信 (Prudential) 的英国和欧洲储蓄和保险业务与 M&G 合并而成立。

item.title: 独家：中国国务院抑制12个“高风险”地区债务增长——消息人士
item.description:
China's cabinet has restricted the ability of local governments in 12 heavily indebted regions to take on new debt and placed limits on what new state-funded projects they can launch, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.

三名知情人士称，中国国务院限制了 12 个重债地区地方政府承担新债务的能力，并限制了他们可以启动的新的国家资助项目。

The 12 regions, which cover a wide swathe of the nation, will only be allowed to take on specified projects, such as those approved by the central government, the sources said. Other projects, such new railway stations and power plants, will not be permitted.

消息人士称，这12个地区覆盖全国大部分地区，只能承接特定项目，例如经中央政府批准的项目。其他项目，例如新火车站和发电厂，将不会被允许。

The sources were citing a cabinet document dated late September that was delivered to local governments and state lenders this month.

消息人士援引了一份日期为 9 月底的内阁文件，该文件已于本月交付给地方政府和国有贷款机构。

The order also specifies that debt growth of local government financing vehicles (LGFVs) should not be higher than average loan growth rates of the corporate sector in the province where the LGFVs are located, two of the sources said.

两位消息人士称，该命令还规定，地方政府融资平台（LGFV）的债务增长不得高于地方政府融资平台所在省份企业部门的平均贷款增长率。

The move by China's cabinet, or the State Council, to contain local government debt has not been previously reported.

此前并未报道过中国内阁或国务院遏制地方政府债务的举措。

The State Council did not reply to a Reuters' request for comment.

国务院没有回复路透社的置评请求。

The measures reflect an effort by China's government to balance the need to defuse local government debt risks while pumping money into major infrastructure projects to stimulate the country's flagging economy.

这些措施反映了中国政府在化解地方政府债务风险和向重大基础设施项目注入资金以刺激中国疲弱经济之间取得平衡的努力。

In practice, that means increasing debt at the national level while attempting to lower debt at the local level. On Tuesday, China approved an additional 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion) sovereign bond issue to support the economy.

实际上，这意味着增加国家层面的债务，同时试图降低地方层面的债务。周二，中国批准额外发行1 万亿元人民币（1,370 亿美元）主权债券以支持经济。

According to the new order from the State Council, local governments will only be permitted to take on debt to fund major projects approved by the state council as well as a few types of projects in key areas. Those projects include the redevelopment of urban neighbourhoods and building affordable housing, two of the sources said.

根据国务院的新命令，地方政府举债只能用于国务院批准的重大项目和重点领域的少数类型项目。两位消息人士称，这些项目包括城市社区的重建和建设经济适用房。

HIGH-RISK REGIONS

The 12 regions were previously identified as areas with "high risks" of defaulting on debt obligations. They were 7 provinces, including Liaoning and Jilin on the border with North Korea as well as Guizhou and Yunnan in the southwest, three autonomous regions and Tianjin and Chongqing cities.

这12个地区此前被确定为债务违约“高风险”地区。分别是与朝鲜接壤的辽宁、吉林以及西南的贵州、云南等7个省份、3个自治区以及天津、重庆市。

Repayment of debt due this year and 2024 by the regions will be prioritised, and debt extensions and new bank loans to replace existing loans will be allowed, the document said, according to two of the sources.

据两位消息人士透露，该文件称，各地区将优先偿还今年和 2024 年到期的债务，并允许债务延期和新的银行贷款取代现有贷款。

All three sources declined to be identified as the policies were confidential.

由于政策属于机密，三位消息人士均拒绝透露姓名。

Debt-laden municipalities represent a major risk to the world's second-largest economy and its financial stability, amid a deepening property crisis, years of over-investment in infrastructure and huge bills to contain the COVID-19 pandemic.

在不断加深的房地产危机、多年来基础设施的过度投资以及遏制新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情的巨额支出的背景下，负债累累的城市对世界第二大经济体及其金融稳定构成了重大风险。

The crash in property prices and a cash crunch have left developers in no shape to buy more land, traditionally a key source of local government revenue. Land sales in January-September were down almost 20 percent from the year-ago period.

房地产价格暴跌和现金紧缩导致开发商无力购买更多土地，而土地历来是地方政府收入的主要来源。 1-9月土地出让金同比下降近20%。

Local government debt loads are far higher than at the central government level.

地方政府债务负担远高于中央政府。

While central government debt is only 21% OF GDP, local debt reached 92 trillion yuan ($12.58 trillion), or 76% of the country's economic output in 2022, up from 62.2% in 2019. The massive piles of debt highlights local governments' financial stress, fuelling concerns of a systemic financial crisis.

虽然中央政府债务仅占 GDP 的 21%，但地方债务将达到 92 万亿元人民币（12.58 万亿美元），占中国经济产出的 76%，高于 2019 年的 62.2%。巨额债务凸显了地方政府的财政状况压力，加剧了对系统性金融危机的担忧。

Part of that is debt issued by LGFVs, which cities use to raise money for infrastructure projects, often at the urging of the central government when it needs to boost economic growth.

其中一部分是地方政府融资平台发行的债务，城市利用这些债务为基础设施项目筹集资金，通常是在中央政府需要促进经济增长时的敦促下进行的。

China's Politburo, a top decision-making body of the ruling Communist Party, said in late July said it would announce a basket of measures to reduce local government debt risks, but no detailed plans have been officially unveiled yet.

中国共产党的最高决策机构政治局7月下旬表示，将宣布一揽子措施来降低地方政府债务风险，但尚未正式公布详细计划。

China has told state-owned banks to roll over existing local government debt with longer-term loans at lower interest rates, Reuters reported last week.

据路透社上周报道，中国已要求国有银行以较低利率提供长期贷款来展期现有地方政府债务。

In addition, a slew of local governments - mostly debt-ridden ones such as Yunnan and Guizhou - have started selling so-called refinancing bonds this month in a special, one-time programme to replace other forms of borrowing. The bond issuance is widely believed to be part of Beijing's measures to defuse debt risks of LGFVs.

此外，许多地方政府（主要是云南和贵州等负债累累的地方政府）本月开始通过一项特殊的一次性计划出售所谓的再融资债券，以取代其他形式的借款。人们普遍认为，此次债券发行是北京化解地方政府融资平台债务风险措施的一部分。

Reporting by Beijing Newsroom; Editing by Don Durfee and Raju Gopalakrishnan

item.title: 香港寻求新的经济优势，同时加强政策蓝图的安全
item.description:
Summary:
  • New national security laws to be tabled in 2024

    新国家安全法将于2024年出台
  • Economic growth of 4-5% expected in 2023

    预计 2023 年经济增长 4-5%
  • Property transaction fees halved for some buyers

    部分买家的房产交易费用减半
  • Stock transaction fees shaved from 0.13% to 0.1%

    股票交易费用从 0.13% 削减至 0.1%

Buffeted by years of upheaval and China's economic slowdown, Hong Kong's leader on Wednesday outlined his annual policy vision focused on kick-starting the ailing property market while further tightening national security laws.

受到多年动荡和中国经济放缓的冲击，香港特首周三概述了他的年度政策愿景，重点是重振陷入困境的房地产市场，同时进一步收紧国家安全法。

The policy blueprint, the second delivered by Chief Executive John Lee since he took office, comes at a critical moment for Hong Kong, as the Chinese-ruled former British colony looks to emerge from the turmoil of the last few years.

这份政策蓝图是行政长官李家超上任以来的第二份政策蓝图，它是在香港的关键时刻出台的，因为这个中国统治的前英国殖民地似乎正在摆脱过去几年的动荡。

Mass pro-democracy protests in 2019, the COVID lockdown, the emigration of tens of thousands of residents and unease over a national security crackdown have all sapped energy from one of Asia's most vibrant cities.

2019 年的大规模民主抗议活动、新冠疫情封锁、数万名居民移民以及对国家安全镇压的不安，都削弱了亚洲最具活力的城市之一的活力。

Lee, a former police officer, in a three-hour speech outlined policies that ranged from slashing property transaction fees to geopolitics and offering cash bonuses for local parents to have more babies.

前警官李在三小时的演讲中概述了从削减房产交易费到地缘政治以及为当地父母生育更多孩子提供现金奖励等一系列政策。

"Hong Kong has many strengths. We should treasure them, without inflating our ego. In face of competition, we should never be complacent; we should not be frustrated or doubt ourselves when we lag behind," Lee said.

李说：“香港有很多优势，我们应该珍惜它们，不要自我膨胀。面对竞争，我们不应该自满；当我们落后时，我们不应该沮丧或怀疑自己。”

Lee's primary focus was on stimulating Hong Kong's economy, which contracted 3.5% last year, and luring back international businesses and capital at a time when the local stock market has struggled and families have sold flats and moved abroad.

李的主要重点是刺激香港经济（去年收缩了3.5%），并在本地股市低迷、家庭出售公寓并移居海外之际吸引国际企业和资本回流。

But Lee, who was sanctioned by the U.S. government for his role in cracking down on freedoms after the pro-democracy protests in 2019, also emphasized the need to bolster national security -- a priority for China's President Xi Jinping.

但因在 2019 年民主抗议活动后压制自由而受到美国政府制裁的李也强调了加强国家安全的必要性——这是中国国家主席习近平的首要任务。

"External forces continue to meddle in Hong Kong affairs," he said, adding that fresh security legislation including laws to counter alleged espionage activities, known as Article 23, would be enacted by the end of 2024.

他表示，“外部势力继续干预香港事务”，并补充说，新的安全立法，包括打击涉嫌间谍活动的法律（即第 23 条）将于 2024 年底颁布。

"We should pay particular attention to those anti-China and destabilising activities camouflaged in the name of human rights, freedom, democracy and livelihood," he said.

他说：“我们应该特别关注那些打着人权、自由、民主、民生旗号的反华、破坏稳定活动。”

To enhance Chinese national identity and unity, Hong Kong would be rolling out "patriotic" education in local schools, Lee said.

李说，为了增强中华民族的认同和团结，香港将在当地学校开展“爱国主义”教育。

He also said cybersecurity would be strengthened to protect critical infrastructure.

他还表示将加强网络安全以保护关键基础设施。

Some observers say Lee's economic and security priorities are difficult to balance.

一些观察家表示，李明博的经济和安全优先事项很难平衡。

"The Hong Kong business environment is already facing challenges due to an unwelcoming atmosphere and a repressive political climate," said Sunny Cheung, an exiled activist and visiting fellow at John Hopkins University in Washington D.C.

华盛顿约翰·霍普金斯大学访问学者、流亡活动人士张阳光表示：“由于不受欢迎的气氛和压抑的政治气氛，香港的商业环境已经面临挑战。”

PROPERTY AND STOCKS

Turning to the property market, Lee said stamp duty, would be halved to 7.5% from 15% for second home buyers and non-citizen buyers with immediate effect, to help revive a sector that is one of the economy's pillars.

谈及房地产市场，李表示，第二套房买家和非公民买家的印花税将从 15% 减半至 7.5%，立即生效，以帮助振兴作为经济支柱之一的行业。

Other adjustments were made to allow some home owners to sell properties after two years without incurring hefty duties.

还进行了其他调整，允许一些房主在两年后出售房产，而无需缴纳高额关税。

And Lee said the government would continue to increase the overall supply of land for public and private housing.

李显龙表示，政府将继续增加公共和私人住房的土地供应总量。

The reaction from investors was lukewarm, with shares of Sun Hung Kai Properties (0016.HK) and Henderson Land (0012.HK), two major residential property developers, closing down 0.5% and 0.7%, respectively.

投资者反应冷淡，两大住宅地产开发商新鸿基地产(0016.HK)及恒基兆业地产(0012.HK)股价分别收跌0.5%及0.7%。

Hong Kong had tried to cool the property market during a surge of nearly 300% in home prices in the decade to 2019. Since then prices have fallen 13%.

截至 2019 年的十年间，香港房价飙升近 300%，期间曾试图给房地产市场降温。此后房价已下跌 13%。

In August, property prices dropped to a seven-month low, and realtors expect them to end 2023 as much as 5% down.

8 月份，房地产价格跌至七个月低点，房地产经纪人预计 2023 年底房价将下跌 5%。

"The relaxation of cooling measures is only a band-aid solution that is unlikely to reverse the downward trend of home prices," said Joseph Tsang, chairman of property consultancy JLL in Hong Kong, citing the global economic downturn and interest rate hikes as lingering factors weighing on the market.

香港房地产咨询公司仲量联行主席曾钰成表示：“放松降温措施只是权宜之计，不太可能扭转房价下跌的趋势。”他表示，全球经济低迷和加息的影响挥之不去。影响市场的因素。

Lee said stamp duties for stock transactions would be reduced to 0.1% from 0.13% to help bolster liquidity in the Hong Kong market, and market data fees would be cut later this year to help brokerages.

李表示，股票交易印花税将从 0.13% 降至 0.1%，以帮助增强香港市场的流动性，今年晚些时候还将削减市场数据费，以帮助券商。

He added Hong Kong would seek to strengthen its role as an offshore yuan centre and bolster financial ties to China, and enhance schemes to attract foreign talent.

他补充说，香港将寻求加强其作为离岸人民币中心的作用，加强与中国的金融联系，并加强吸引外国人才的计划。

item.title: 分析：中国掌握香港股市萎缩的关键
item.description:
Hong Kong's efforts to revive its shrinking stock market are mere stopgap solutions, as analysts say a reversal in fortunes for Asia's premier financial hub would not be possible without a major improvement in China's economic prospects.

香港重振不断萎缩的股市的努力只是权宜之计，分析人士表示，如果中国经济前景没有重大改善，亚洲首要金融中心的命运就不可能逆转。

Hong Kong's government has for months tried to boost turnover and revive a torpid stock market, the latest coming on Wednesday when its leader John Lee announced an immigration plan tied to investments and a cut in the stamp duty on stock trades.

几个月来，香港政府一直试图提高营业额并重振低迷的股市，最新的一次是周三，香港领导人李家超宣布了一项与投资相关的移民计划，并削减了股票交易印花税。

But the region's key financial centre and gateway to the world's second largest economy is a shadow of its former self as foreign investors reduce exposure to a China they view as increasingly isolated by its opaque policies, struggling property sector and crackdowns on private enterprise.

但随着外国投资者减少对中国的投资，该地区的主要金融中心和通往世界第二大经济体的门户已不再是昔日的影子。他们认为，中国因不透明的政策、陷入困境的房地产业和对私营企业的打击而日益孤立。

With a market value of around $4.3 trillion, Hong Kong is home to one of the top-ranked stock markets globally just behind those in the United States, Japan, China and Europe.

香港的市值约为 4.3 万亿美元，是全球排名最高的股票市场之一，仅次于美国、日本、中国和欧洲。

But it compares poorly on turnover, with a daily average of $11.3 billion between January and June compared with $261 billion for Nasdaq, $27.9 billion for Japan and $77.9 billion for China's Shenzhen exchange. New share offerings in Hong Kong have fizzled.

但它的成交量却较差，1月至6月的日均成交额为113亿美元，而纳斯达克的日均成交额为2610亿美元，日本的日均成交额为279亿美元，中国深圳交易所的日均成交额为779亿美元。香港的新股发行已经失败。

Dickie Wong, executive director of research at Kingston Securities, said the stamp-duty cut was in line with expectations.

金利丰证券(Kingston Securities)研究执行董事迪基·黄(Dickie Wong)表示，印花税下调符合预期。

It might spur a "short-lived rebound" in the Hong Kong stock market, he said, but longer-term issues such as the exodus of foreign investors and the tensions between China and the United States would remain an overhang.

他表示，这可能会刺激香港股市“短暂反弹”，但外国投资者撤离以及中美之间紧张局势等长期问题仍将是一个悬而未决的问题。

The Hang Seng stock index (.HSI) and the Hang Seng China Enterprises Index (.HSCE) are down more than 11% each this year.

恒生股票指数(.HSI)和恒生中国企业指数(.HSCE)今年均下跌超过 11%。

The HSI (.HSI) hit a 22,700.85 peak in late January and is currently around 17,000. Daily turnover has fallen below HK$80 billion on numerous occasions since the second quarter, halving from an average of HK$160 billion in 2021.

恒指(.HSI)在 1 月底触及 22,700.85 点峰值，目前约为 17,000 点。自第二季度以来，每日成交额多次跌破 800 亿港元，较 2021 年平均 1,600 亿港元减少一半。

"Liquidity is clearly down due to foreign investors reducing exposure to China, since many investors, ourselves included, access China shares from Hong Kong," said Rob Brewis, a portfolio manager at UK-based asset manager Aubrey Capital Management.

英国资产管理公司奥布里资本管理公司(Aubrey Capital Management)的投资组合经理罗布·布鲁伊斯(Rob Brewis)表示：“由于外国投资者减少了对中国的投资，流动性明显下降，因为包括我们自己在内的许多投资者都从香港购买中国股票。”

"I suspect it is due to the perception of worse prospects in the Chinese economy as well as enhanced political risk. The only solution to this is just a reversal of these trends, i.e. better economy and better foreign relations. There is no easy answer."

“我怀疑这是由于人们认为中国经济前景更糟以及政治风险增加。解决这个问题的唯一办法就是扭转这些趋势，即更好的经济和更好的外交关系。没有简单的答案。 ”

Eddie Tam, CIO of Hong Kong-based Central Asset Investments, also reckons funds are not done cutting exposure to China, and foreign investors "are not nearly finished with the selling off of Hong Kong stocks."

总部位于香港的Central Asset Investments首席投资官Eddie Tam也认为，基金尚未完成削减对中国的投资，外国投资者“还没有完成抛售香港股票的工作”。

China's economy has stumbled this year after a brief post-COVID bounce, with growth hurt by a protracted property crisis, elevated debt levels and sluggish demand.

中国经济在经历了疫情后的短暂反弹后，今年陷入了困境，长期的房地产危机、债务水平上升和需求低迷损害了经济增长。

BROKERS BEMOAN

The decline in volumes has been dire for Hong Kong's hundreds of small hole-in-the-wall brokerages. Local media reported that a record 47 of the 638 trading participants on the Hong Kong exchange shut shop last year.

对于香港数百家小型券商来说，交易量的下降是可怕的。当地媒体报道称，去年香港交易所 638 家交易参与者中有 47 家关门歇业，创历史新高。

Chinese firms listed in Hong Kong, such as tech giants Tencent (0700.HK) and Alibaba (9988.HK), comprise the bulk of the turnover on the Hong Kong exchange, leaving Hong Kong hostage to China's fortunes.

在香港上市的中国公司，例如科技巨头腾讯（0700.HK）和阿里巴巴（9988.HK） ，占据了香港交易所成交量的大部分，使香港成为中国财富的人质。

Alvin Cheung, associate director at Prudential Brokerage whose main businesses include retail investors' securities broking, margin financing and IPO subscriptions, said his industry is “very quiet” now and he has been "worrying about our business sustainability for a while”.

主要业务包括散户证券经纪、保证金融资和IPO认购的保诚经纪副董事Alvin Cheung表示，他的行业现在“非常安静”，他“担心我们业务的可持续性已经有一段时间了”。

“The current trading volume is extremely low, and investors are reluctant to buy because they see no other investors participating. The willingness to invest has reduced sharply," said Cheung.

“目前的交易量极低，投资者不愿意购买，因为他们看到没有其他投资者参与。投资意愿急剧下降。”张说。

That is dampening stock prices, "so we see the Hang Seng Index going from 20,000 to 18,000 to 17,000.”

这正在打压股价，“因此我们看到恒生指数从 20,000 点跌至 18,000 点，再跌至 17,000 点。”

“Market sentiment is even worse than 2008,” said Alex Wong, a partner of Alex KY Wong Asset Management Company, referring to the Global Financial Crisis.

Alex KY Wong资产管理公司合伙人Alex Wong在谈到全球金融危机时表示，“市场情绪比2008年更糟糕”。

“At that time, everyone still believed in passing through the cycle. The problem this time is many people are worried about a balance sheet recession (in China)," said Wong, who has been investing in the city for over 30 years.

“当时大家还相信能够穿越轮回。这次的问题是很多人担心（中国）资产负债表衰退，”在这座城市投资了 30 多年的黄说。

Local investors who'd been buying in Hong Kong for many years were feeling discouraged, while the younger generation was more into trading U.S. stocks, he said. "It’s very difficult to attract new money, so you have a structural problem”.

他说，多年来在香港买入的本地投资者感到灰心，而年轻一代则更热衷于交易美国股票。 “吸引新资金非常困难，因此存在结构性问题”。

item.title: 中国国防部批评五角大楼年度报告
item.description:
China's defence ministry on Wednesday denounced the U.S. Defense Department's annual report on China, saying it distorts the country's security policy and military strategy.

中国国防部周三谴责美国国防部年度对华报告，称其歪曲中国安全政策和军事战略。

Over the next decade, the People's Republic of China will rapidly modernise, diversify, and expand its nuclear forces, the Pentagon said in its report to U.S. Congress, laying out China's national ambitions, including its defence policy and military strategies.

五角大楼在向美国国会提交的报告中表示，未来十年，中华人民共和国将迅速实现核力量现代化、多样化和扩张，阐述了中国的国家雄心，包括国防政策和军事战略。

The Pentagon said China has more than 500 nuclear warheads and will probably have more than 1,000 warheads by 2030. The report said China would use new fast-breeder reactors and reprocessing facilities to produce plutonium for its nuclear weapons, despite publicly saying the technologies are intended for peaceful purposes.

五角大楼表示，中国拥有超过 500 枚核弹头，到 2030 年可能会拥有超过 1,000 枚核弹头。该报告称，中国将使用新的快中子增殖反应堆和后处理设施来生产核武器所需的钚，尽管公开表示这些技术的目的是出于和平目的。

"We express our strong dissatisfaction and resolute opposition to this report," Chinese Defence Ministry spokesperson Wu Qian said in a statement, adding that it "exaggerates and hypes the non-existent 'Chinese military threat'".

中国国防部发言人吴谦在一份声明中表示，“我们对这份报告表示强烈不满和坚决反对”，并补充说，该报告“夸大和炒作了不存在的‘中国军事威胁’”。

Wu said the development of China's armed forces is aimed at containing the threat of war, safeguarding its own security and safeguarding world peace, and is not aimed at any specific country or target.

吴邦国表示，中国军队的发展是为了遏制战争威胁、维护自身安全、维护世界和平，不针对任何特定国家和目标。

China and the United States have recently traded barbs over global and national security concerns, military interactions in the South China Sea and over Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory.

中国和美国最近就全球和国家安全问题、南海军事互动以及中国声称拥有主权的台湾问题互相指责。

The Pentagon said in 2022 that China "amplified diplomatic, political, and military pressure against Taiwan".

五角大楼在2022年表示，中国“加大了对台湾的外交、政治和军事压力”。

"The so-called report on China's military power released by the United States is full of all kinds of wrong content, including the statement on the Taiwan issue," a spokesperson for China's Taiwan Affairs Office said at a media briefing on Wednesday.

中国国台办发言人周三在例行记者会上表示，美国发布的所谓中国军力报告充满了各种错误内容，包括有关台湾问题的表述。

Calling the military-to-military relationship an important part of Sino-U.S. relations, the Defence Ministry's Wu said, "we maintain frank and effective communication with the United States through military diplomacy".

吴仪表示，两军关系是中美关系的重要组成部分，“我们通过军事外交同美国保持着坦诚有效的沟通”。

But he added the difficulties and obstacles facing relations between the two militaries are created by the United States.

但他补充说，两军关系面临的困难和障碍是美国制造的。

"The United States pretends to be confused, while doing things that harm China's security interests, but at the same time shouting that it wants to manage the crisis and strengthen communication," Wu said.

“美国装糊涂，一边做损害中国安全利益的事情，一边喊着要管控危机、加强沟通，”吴说。

The latest exchange between the two countries comes days before China hosts foreign defence officials at the 10th Xiangshan Forum in Beijing from Oct. 29 to 31.

两国之间的最新交流是在中国于 10 月 29 日至 31 日在北京接待外国国防官员出席第十届香山论坛之前几天进行的。

The United States accepted China's invitation after China turned down a meeting a few months ago between the two countries' defence chiefs.

在中国几个月前拒绝两国国防部长会晤后，美国接受了中国的邀请。

item.title: 官员表示，随着预算赤字上升，中国发行新债券将有助于经济复苏
item.description:
China's new sovereign bonds will help bolster the economic recovery, China's vice finance minister Zhu Zhongming said on Wednesday, as the government's stepped-up fiscal stimulus sharply raises its budget deficit.

中国财政部副部长朱忠明周三表示，中国新发行的主权债券将有助于促进经济复苏，因为政府加大财政刺激力度，导致预算赤字大幅上升。

China's top parliament body has approved a 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion) in sovereign bond issuance to help rebuild areas hit by this year's floods and improve urban infrastructure to cope with future disasters, state media said on Tuesday.

官方媒体周二称，中国最高人大机构已批准发行1万亿元人民币（1370亿美元）的主权债券，以帮助重建今年遭受洪水袭击的地区，并改善城市基础设施以应对未来的灾害。

"After the treasury bond funds are put into use, it will help drive domestic demand and further consolidate the recovery of the economy," Zhu said at a news conference.

朱镕基在新闻发布会上表示：“国债资金投入使用后，将有利于拉动内需，进一步巩固经济复苏。”

The world's second-largest economy grew faster than expected in the third quarter, improving the chances that Beijing can meet its growth target of around 5% for 2023. But economists say the crisis-hit property sector remains a drag on the economy and continues to cloud the growth outlook.

全球第二大经济体第三季度增长快于预期，提高了北京实现 2023 年 5% 左右增长目标的机会。但经济学家表示，遭受危机打击的房地产行业仍然拖累经济，并将继续拖累经济。增长前景蒙上阴影。

In a rare move, China sharply lifted its 2023 budget deficit to around 3.8% of gross domestic product from an originally set 3% due to the rise in central government debt, according to state media.

据官方媒体报道，由于中央政府债务增加，中国罕见地将2023年预算赤字占国内生产总值的比例从最初设定的3%大幅提高至3.8%左右。

The proposed increase in bond issuance comes as Beijing prepares to inject a fresh dose of fiscal stimulus to shore up the economic recovery, policy insiders say, but there are worries reverting to debt-funded stimulus would undermine the move to a consumer-led economic growth model.

政策人士表示，拟议增加债券发行之际，北京正准备注入新一剂财政刺激措施以支撑经济复苏，但有人担心，恢复债务融资刺激措施将破坏向消费者主导型经济增长的转变模型。

Some analysts played down the near-term positive economic impact of the new debt issuance.

一些分析师淡化了新债发行对近期经济的积极影响。

"We believe the economic impact of this 1 trillion yuan in additional CGBs (Chinese government bonds) should not be overstated, especially in the near term," Ting Lu, chief China economist at Nomura, said in a note.

野村证券首席中国经济学家陆挺在一份报告中表示：“我们认为，不应过分夸大新增1万亿元人民币国债的经济影响，尤其是在短期内。”

"Fiscal multiplier effects from spending on water conservancy projects is likely to be rather limited."

“水利工程支出的财政乘数效应可能相当有限。”

China will reasonably set the pace of bond insurance and match the issuance with spending, Zhu said, adding that authorities will take steps to prevent bond fund misuses.

朱表示，中国将合理安排债券保险节奏，实现发行与支出相匹配，并采取措施防止债券基金滥用。

The government's debt level is still within a reasonable range, the minister said, without giving details.

这位部长表示，政府债务水平仍处于合理范围内，但没有透露细节。

Some policy advisers say the central government has room to spend more as its debt as a share of GDP is just 21%, far lower than 76% for local governments.

一些政策顾问表示，中央政府有增加支出的空间，因为其债务占GDP的比重仅为21%，远低于地方政府的76%。

Half of the funds raised via the bond issuance will be spent this year and the other half will be used next year, according to state media said.

据官方媒体报道，通过债券发行筹集的资金一半将在今年使用，另一半将在明年使用。

Analysts at UBS expect the government to raise its budget deficit and special local bond quotas for 2024, alongside further cuts in interest rates and bank reserve requirement ratios.

瑞银分析师预计，政府将提高2024年的预算赤字和特别地方债券配额，同时进一步降低利率和银行存款准备金率。

China's parliament has also approved a bill to allow local governments to front load part of 2024 local bond quotas.

中国人大还批准了一项法案，允许地方政府提前加载部分2024年地方债券额度。

Local governments had been told to complete the issuance of the 2023 quota of 3.8 trillion yuan in special local bonds by September to fund infrastructure projects.

地方政府被告知要在9月份之前完成2023年3.8万亿元地方专项债券额度的发行，为基础设施项目提供资金。

($1 = 7.3098 Chinese yuan renminbi)

（1 美元 = 7.3098 人民币）

item.title: 中国用新舰艇追赶美国和俄罗斯的导弹潜艇能力
item.description:
China has launched its first nuclear-powered guided missile submarines, according to the Pentagon's latest report on China's military - giving it land and sea attack options once the sole province of U.S. and Russian vessels.

根据五角大楼关于中国军事的最新报告，中国已经下水了第一艘核动力导弹潜艇，这让中国拥有了曾经是美国和俄罗斯船只的唯一管辖范围的陆地和海上攻击选择。

The Pentagon report, published Oct. 20, marks the first apparent confirmation that modified submarines seen in Chinese shipyards over the last 18 months are Type 093B guided missile submarines.

五角大楼10月20日发布的报告首次明显证实过去18个月在中国造船厂看到的改装潜艇是093B型导弹潜艇。

Reuters revealed in May 2022 that satellite images from Huludao shipyard in northeast China showed a new or upgraded class of submarine, possibly with vertical tubes for launching cruise missiles.

路透社于 2022 年 5 月透露，中国东北葫芦岛造船厂的卫星图像显示了一种新型或升级型潜艇，可能配有用于发射巡航导弹的垂直管。

The Pentagon report says that in the short term, the Chinese navy "will have the ability to conduct long-range precision strikes against land targets from its submarine and surface combatants using land-attack cruise missiles, notably enhancing (China's) power projection capability".

五角大楼的报告称，短期内，中国海军“将有能力使用对地攻击巡航导弹从潜艇和水面战舰上对陆地目标进行远程精确打击，特别是增强（中国的）力量投送能力” 。

Known as SSGNs, conventionally armed missile submarines were developed by the Soviet Union during the Cold War in part to target U.S. aircraft carriers, while the U.S. Navy developed its own version by converting ballistic missile boats to carry large numbers of land-attack Tomahawk cruise missiles.

常规武装导弹潜艇被称为SSGN，是苏联在冷战期间开发的，部分目标是针对美国航空母舰，而美国海军则通过将弹道导弹艇改装为携带大量对地攻击战斧巡航导弹来开发自己的版本。

Cruise missiles are typically long-range, precision weapons that, unlike ballistic weapons, fly at low altitudes or skim the surface of the sea.

巡航导弹通常是远程精确武器，与弹道武器不同，巡航导弹可以低空飞行或掠过海面。

The submarine USS Florida fired 93 Tomahawks against Libyan air defences in 2011 - the first combat strikes from a U.S. SSGN and an event that regional military attaches say was closely studied by Chinese strategists.

2011年，佛罗里达号潜艇向利比亚防空系统发射了93枚“战斧”导弹——这是美国战略核潜艇的首次战斗打击，地区武官称中国战略家对这一事件进行了密切研究。

Some analysts say the PLA navy will be eager to deploy the vessels as an extra weapon against aircraft carriers as well as a land-attack platform, allowing strikes from a far greater range than its fleets of smaller attack submarines.

一些分析人士表示，解放军海军将渴望部署这些舰艇，作为对抗航空母舰的额外武器以及对陆攻击平台，使其能够从比其小型攻击潜艇舰队更远的范围进行攻击。

The report notes that three of the new SSGNs could be operational by next year, as part of a wider expansion of its submarine fleet - both nuclear and diesel powered - which could number 65 vessels in 2025.

报告指出，三艘新的弹道导弹核潜艇可能会在明年投入使用，作为其潜艇舰队（核动力和柴油动力）更广泛扩张的一部分，到 2025 年，潜艇舰队的数量可能达到 65 艘。

The Chinese defence ministry did not respond to questions from Reuters.

中国国防部没有回应路透社的提问。

The confirmation comes amid an intensifying submarine arms race as China constructs a new generation of nuclear-armed boats as part of its evolving deterrent force.

这一确认是在潜艇军备竞赛加剧之际做出的，中国正在建造新一代核潜艇，作为其不断发展的威慑力量的一部分。

The effort to track China's submarines at sea is one of the core drivers of increased deployments and contingency planning by the U.S. Navy and other militaries across the Indo-Pacific region.

在海上追踪中国潜艇的努力是美国海军和印太地区其他军队增加部署和应急计划的核心驱动力之一。

Singapore-based security scholar Collin Koh said the SSGNs were an important new capability for the Chinese navy.

新加坡安全学者科林·科(Collin Koh)表示，弹道导弹核潜艇是中国海军的一项重要新能力。

With an expected core armament of cruise missiles, "this potentially allows them to carry out saturated land and anti-ship attacks at standoff range”, he said, which would complicate strategic calculations by China's rivals.

他表示，凭借预期的巡航导弹核心武器，“这可能使他们能够在防区外范围内进行饱和陆地和反舰攻击”，这将使中国竞争对手的战略计算变得复杂。

"I would also expect the Chinese have learned from the Russian experience in using them to threaten U.S. aircraft carriers – with an SSGN, you can launch strikes at standoff range, unlike a typical attack submarine that could have more limited weapon options, and that is a real advantage," said Koh, of the S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies.

“我还希望中国人从俄罗斯使用它们威胁美国航空母舰的经验中吸取教训——使用弹道导弹核潜艇，你可以在防区外范围内发动攻击，这与典型的攻击潜艇不同，后者的武器选择可能更加有限，而且这是一个真正的优势，”拉惹勒南国际研究学院的 Koh 说。

Research discussed at the U.S. Naval War College in May noted that the PLA was close to breakthroughs in making its nuclear-powered submarines far quieter and more difficult for the U.S. and its allies to track.

美国海军战争学院五月份讨论的研究表明，解放军在使其核动力潜艇变得更安静、更难以被美国及其盟国追踪方面即将取得突破。

Some diplomats and analysts said, however, that it was unclear whether those breakthroughs had been incorporated into the recently launched SSGNs. The upgrades are expected in nuclear-powered boats launched before the end of the decade.

然而，一些外交官和分析人士表示，目前尚不清楚这些突破是否已被纳入最近发射的弹道导弹核潜艇中。预计本世纪末之前推出的核动力船将进行升级。

"Unless they are certain of improvements, we can expect the PLA navy to be cautious in how they initially deploy them," said an Asian military attache who is tracking China's submarine force. The attache declined to be named because of the sensitivity of the matter. "But we know the submarine force is a priority for Xi Jinping, and this is one more sign they are getting there."

一位正在跟踪中国潜艇部队的亚洲武官表示：“除非他们确定能取得改进，否则我们可以预期解放军海军在最初部署这些潜艇的方式上会持谨慎态度。”由于此事敏感，该专员拒绝透露姓名。 “但我们知道潜艇部队是习近平的首要任务，这是他们正在实现这一目标的又一个迹象。”

Reporting By Greg Torode. Editing by Gerry Doyle

格雷格·托罗德报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 菲律宾寻求多边努力避免南海冲突
item.description:
The Philippines will boost multilateral activities including freedom of navigation patrols in the South China Sea, its defence minister said on Wednesday, expressing hope that more countries would "join our fight" after an altercation with China this week.

菲律宾国防部长周三表示，菲律宾将加强包括南海航行自由巡逻在内的多边活动，并在本周与中国发生争执后表示希望更多国家“加入我们的战斗”。

The Philippines and China earlier this week accused each other of raising tensions, with Manila saying China's coastguard intentionally collided with its boats on a resupply mission to a small contingent of troops stationed on a rusty ship grounded two decades ago.

菲律宾和中国本周早些时候互相指责对方加剧紧张局势，马尼拉表示，中国海岸警卫队在向二十年前搁浅的一艘生锈的船上驻扎的一小支部队执行补给任务时故意与其船只相撞。

The incident, near a disputed reef in the Philippines' exclusive economic zone, drew widespread condemnation of Beijing, which says it has sovereignty over almost the entire South China Sea, despite an international arbitration award declaring that claim has no legal basis.

这起事件发生在菲律宾专属经济区的一个有争议的珊瑚礁附近，引起了北京的广泛谴责。北京称其对几乎整个南海拥有主权，尽管国际仲裁裁决宣称这一主张没有法律依据。

The recent incident with China "could result in more willing nations to join our fight," Defence Secretary Gilberto Teodoro said in a televised interview on state-run PTV. He did not elaborate on what that would entail.

国防部长吉尔伯托·特奥多罗在接受国营 PTV 电视采访时表示，最近与中国发生的事件“可能会导致更多国家愿意加入我们的战斗”。他没有详细说明这将带来什么。

Teodoro also said he is optimistic on the progress on reciprocal access agreement between Japan and the Philippines.

特奥多罗还表示，他对日本和菲律宾之间互惠准入协议的进展感到乐观。

Philippine ties with China have deteriorated this year, with more confrontations at sea, coinciding with Manila strengthening its decades-old military alliance with the United States, including granting Washington expanded access to its bases.

菲律宾与中国的关系今年恶化，海上对抗更多，同时马尼拉加强了与美国数十年的军事联盟，包括允许华盛顿扩大其基地的使用范围。
